Function to fill in an n x n correlation AR(1) matrix

get_AR1_CorrMat.Rd

Function to fill in an n x n correlation AR(1) matrix

Usage

get_AR1_CorrMat(n, rho)

Arguments

n

Number of bins

rho

correaltion parameter

Value

correlation matrix for an ar1 process

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
mat <- get_AR1_CorrMat(10, 0.5)
} # }
